channel.title: Startup Events on Pantrypoints
channel.description: Recent content in Startup Events on Pantrypoints

item.title: BSSC Startup Event
item.description: Our team is with Team EZGamio at the BSSC startup event in Saigon. We onboarded Lam who is also our newest cofounder. Hue and Linh and their friend helped out too. BSSC is an entrepreneurship support organization established in 2010. It holds its annual startup event to allow investors and startups to meet.

item.title: Hanoi Techfest 2016
item.description: We’re at Hanoi Techfest from Nov 12-13, 2016 with our volunteers from Hanoi National University. Techfest Vietnam is an annual event by the Ministry of Science and Technology of Vietnam designed to showcase the successes and trends in the Vietnam startup ecosystem. The startups in the event were Gurudy, Wings, Booknhan, Lozi , TechElite, Schoolbus , and Ship60 .
